section.title: Definition
section.para: Specifies packages to be included in the repository.

section.title: Syntax
section.para: When the value of is "system", at least one packages/group or packages/package element is required.
section.programlisting:
<packages> <!-- must have at least one <group> or <package> element --> [<group [repoid=TEXT]>TEXT</group>]* [<package>PACKAGE</package>]*
[<exclude>PACKAGE</exclude>]* </packages>

listitem.para: The name of a package to be excluded from the repository.
This element can occur zero or more times.
This element can occur zero or more times. However, when the value of is "system", the packages top-level element must have at least one packages/group or packages/package element.

@repoid: The id of the repository from which to obtain group data. This id corresponds to a repoid defined in a repo element. If not specified, CentOS Studio merges all matching groups from all repo groupfiles.
The name of a package to be included in the repository. If the TEXT value contains globbing characters, all matching packages from all repositories will be included.
This element can occur zero or more times. However, when the value of is "system", the packages top-level element must have at least one packages/group or packages/package element.

section.title: Examples
section.para: In the example below, the repository that CentOS Studio generates will include packages from several groups as well as a few individual packages. Packages from the "base" and "core" groups of the "base" repository will be included. Packages from the remaining groups will be included, irrespective of the repository in which they are defined. Additionally, the "httpd" and "createrepo" packages, as well as all packages matching the glob "samba*" will be included. Finally, the "system-config-soundcard" package will be excluded from the repository.

informalexample.programlisting:
<packages> <!-- include packages from these groups in the "base" repo --> <group id="base">core</group> <group id="base">base</group>
<!-- include packages from these groups defined in any repo --> <group>base-x</group> <group>gnome-desktop</group> <group>smb-server</group> <group>admin-tools</group> <group>web-server</group>
<!-- include these packages --> <package>httpd</package> <package>samba*</package> <package>createrepo</package>
<!-- exclude system-config-soundcard from the system --> <exclude>system-config-soundcard</exclude> </packages>
